CRW_Emeini |guid = 68ab962e-1b9b-4872-b129-88c406969185 }} '''Emeini''' is a character and recruitable [crew member](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) in {{poe2}}. ## Background A veteran cannoneer of both mercenary and RDC ships, Emeini recently made the mistake of punching her commanding officer during a dispute over her shooting skills. The result? She was forced to stand at formation holding a red-hot cannonball. As such, she's looking to pick up mercenary work again, deserting the Company. Brash and irreverent, she's an excellent gunner nonetheless. ## Interactions {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |crew = * {{crewrank|1|helmsman}} * {{crewrank|1|deckhand}} * {{crewrank|3|cannoneer}} * Personality: Impulsive, Irreverent * Can be hired if Neketaka reputation is 2 or more, or if [Maia Rua](/maiaRua/) is with you and your companion relation is positive. }} ## Gallery Portrait Emeini sm.png | Emeini's crew portrait. [Category:Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members](/categoryPillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireCrewMembers/) [Category:The Brass Citadel characters](/categoryTheBrassCitadelCharacters/)

CRW_Emeini |guid = 68ab962e-1b9b-4872-b129-88c406969185 }} '''Emeini''' is a character and recruitable [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire crew members|crew member]] in {{poe2}}. ==Background== A veteran cannoneer of both mercenary and RDC ships, Emeini recently made the mistake of punching her commanding officer during a dispute over her shooting skills. The result? She was forced to stand at formation holding a red-hot cannonball. As such, she's looking to pick up mercenary work again, deserting the Company. Brash and irreverent, she's an excellent gunner nonetheless. ==Interactions== {{Interactions |companion = |wares = |stronghold = |rest = |quests_started = |quests_involved = |none = |crew = * {{crewrank|1|helmsman}} * {{crewrank|1|deckhand}} * {{crewrank|3|cannoneer}} * Personality: Impulsive, Irreverent * Can be hired if Neketaka reputation is 2 or more, or if [[Maia Rua]] is with you and your companion relation is positive. }} ==Gallery== Portrait Emeini sm.png | Emeini's crew portrait.
